subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4
msgSnippet: #: by Robert Watkins s words the mind was *winged* :# ... disclaimer: the continuation would be off the junit list. thanks. It would be great if you can
messageBody:
#: by Robert Watkins's words the mind was *winged* :#
> Alexandru Popescu wrote:
>>>(Cedric, if you're reading this... every one of these points applies to
>>>TestNG as well)
>>>
>> I am not sure which ones are not _already_ available ;-). I will pass again through it to check.
>
> I was browsing through the TestNG source again while I did the last
> message... still none.
>

disclaimer: the continuation would be off the junit list. thanks.

It would be great if you can describe in more detailed what you think is missing from TestNG. As far
as i read in your mail:

1/a decorator I used to set up the JNDI space with mock objects

you can use @Parameter to pass information to your test methods

2/ the example provided in the link looks as our BaseTest used for auto-testing.

3/ there is a @Factory annotation

4/ i have working examples of using annotated dbunit like test without extending needs.

pls let me know if this is answering your post.

:alex |.::the_mindstorm::.|
